scripts.deploy:docker: yarn mustache config/docker.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020/
scripts.deploy:ethereum: yarn prepare:ethereum && yarn graph deploy --studio venus-governance-ethereum
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn prepare:sepolia && yarn graph deploy --studio venus-governance-sepolia
scripts.deploy:arbitrumSepolia: yarn prepare:arbitrumSepolia && yarn graph deploy --studio venus-governance-arbisepolia
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && yarn graph deploy --studio venus-governance-arbitrum
